articles.title: ECB instructs Archer to sit out 2024 IPL; focus on T20 WC - Rediff.com
articles.description: Archer was released by the franchise last week. His name doesn't figure in the list of players who have registered for the IPL auction, set to be held on December 19 in Dubai.
